Experimental ABySS assembly pipeline
================================================================================

```{r load-libraries, message=FALSE}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r read-data}
data.orig <- read.delim("ecoli-assembly-stats.tsv", as.is = TRUE)
```

```{r tidy-data}
data <- data.orig %>%
	separate(name, c("Directory", "File"), "/") %>%
	separate(File, c("Species", "Stage", "Ext")) %>%
	mutate(Directory = factor(Directory),
		Stage = factor(Stage, unique(Stage)))
```

```{r plot-data}
ggplot(data = data) +
	aes(x = Stage, y = N50, color = Directory, shape = Directory, group = Directory) +
	geom_point() +
	geom_line()
```
